{"id":435294102,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1609105871,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"72 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/435294102/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to Roman","memory":"151.5 MB","code":"class symbolMap {\npublic:\n    symbolMap() {\n        m.resize(1001);\n        \n        m[1] = \"I\";\n        m[4] = \"IV\";\n        m[5] = \"V\";\n        m[9] = \"IX\";\n        m[10] = \"X\";\n        m[40] = \"XL\";\n        m[50] = \"L\";\n        m[90] = \"XC\";\n        m[100] = \"C\";\n        m[400] = \"CD\";\n        m[500] = \"D\";\n        m[900] = \"CM\";\n        m[1000] = \"M\";\n    }\n    string getSymbol(int val) {\n        return m[val];\n    }\n    vector<int> getAllValues() {\n        return {1, 4, 5, 9, 10, 40, 50, 90, 100, 400, 500, 900, 1000};\n    }\nprivate:\n    vector<string> m;\n};\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    string intToRoman(int num) {\n        // create an object of symbolMap\n        symbolMap sm;\n        string res = \"\";\n        \n        vector<int> vals = sm.getAllValues();\n    \n        // Divide\n        for(int i = vals.size()-1; i >= 0; i--) {\n            int q = num/vals[i];\n            \n            while(q) {\n                res += sm.getSymbol(vals[i]);\n                q--;\n            }\n            \n            num = num%vals[i];\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-roman"}
